ATL: Chris Sale completed 6 2/3 shutout innings with 10 strikeouts in a no-decision against the Reds on Tuesday
BAL: Charlie Morton will start on Wednesday against the Twins
PHI: Nick Castellanos finished 3-for-5 with a homer, a double and four RBI in leading the Phillies to an 8-4 win over the Rays on Tuesday
WSH: Michael Soroka (biceps) will be activated to start on Wednesday against the Guardians
KC: Bobby Witt Jr. went 1-for-5 and delivered a walk-off RBI single in the ninth inning on Tuesday, propelling the Royals to a 4-3 victory over the White Sox
TB: Yandy Díaz was removed from Tuesday’s game against the Phillies with right hip tightness
NYY: Austin Wells had a grand slam and an RBI single as the Yankees smoked the Padres 12-3 on Tuesday

item.title: [ 73] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases (e.g. 4K editing, high FPS gaming)
State budget and COUNTRY or you will not be helped

>12VHPWR
If a 12VHPWR connector is not fully seated in its socket, the connection can melt.
Do not use aftermarket cables or adapters.

>Intel Raptor Lake / RPL Refresh
Instability reported with 13th and 14th gen, i5 K SKUs and above (incl non-K). Update BIOS and apply Intel Baseline settings. Avoid purchases.

>CPUS
HTPC(4K60)/Web Browsing: i3 12100T
Gaming: R5 9600X; budget: i5 13400; eXtreme: R7 7800X3D
Multicore: Ultra 7 265K; budget: Ultra 5 235; destitute: i5 13400
>Avoid iGPU-less CPUs
>Existing AM4 board with an old chip? Consider a Zen 3 CPU

>GRAPHICS CARDS (@MSRP)
1080p: RTX 3060 12 GB / RTX 4060; ultra budget: used RTX 2060 Super
1440p: RTX 5070; RT: RTX 5070 Ti
2160p: RTX 5080; budget: RTX 5070 Ti
RX 9070 XT: reasonable if at least 33% cheaper than an RTX 5070 Ti or close to price of RTX 5070
Amateur production: RTX 3060 12GB, RTX 5060 Ti 16GB, used RTX 3090, used RTX 4090, RTX 5090

>RAM
DDR4: Zen3/AM4 - 2x 16GB 3600 MT/s CL18; for locked "non-K" 12th/13th/LGA1700 - 2x 16GB 3200 MT/s CL16
DDR5: Zen4/AM5 - 2x 16GB 6000 MT/s CL30; for Core Ultra/LGA1851 - 2x 16GB 6400MT/s CL32

>COOLERS
Thermaltake Phantom Spirit (or variant), Thermaltake Frozen Prism

>PSUS
A new PSU should be ATX 3.1 compliant
Aim for 50-75% PSU utilization at full system load
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>SSDS
WD SN5000 2 TB, Samsung 990 Pro 2 TB
Avoid: cheapest NVMe SSDs
https://ssd.borecraft.com/

>MOTHERBOARDS
Good power delivery is required for Intel CPUs like the i5 13600K and above
Generally don't pair a K CPU with a B mobo chipset

>GAMING MONITORS
AOC Q27G3XMN, MSI MPG 321URX
https://pcpartpicker.com/user/pcbg/saved/dP3v4D

Previous: >>105182774

Original filename: Screenshot_2021-04-04 ZeptoBars.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 43] /sp/ Mods - Seriously, the Soccer Spam Needs to Stop
item.description:
Are you even looking at /sp/? It's being absolutely buried under an avalanche of pointless soccer threads! Over 121 threads hidden. This isn't a soccer-only board.

American sports are forced to exist only in general threads. Why is soccer treated like some special exception that needs a million individual threads clogging up every single page? It doesn't!

Enforce the same rules for everyone! Contain this ridiculous flood of soccer spam and put it where it belongs - in dedicated general threads. This constant clutter is killing the board!

Please get it together and fix this mess.

Sincerely,
A Fed Up, 15-Year Veteran /sp/ User

Original filename: 1731952876220266.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 51] Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimenta
item.description:
Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimentality, and trying to reinvent the wheel (look to the burger/pizza restaurants they open) . Seemingly all of these things have led to a toxic culture of shallow presentation and verbose moralizing. Nothing good or great has come out of it other then the circus freaks who call themselves chiefs.
What will Zoomer cosine look like? I don't reckon it will be as gaudy or preachy as the Millennial but I am in no high hopes of any sort of major change. Ideally there will be a pre-1970 French cuisine revival but I won't hold my breath.

Original filename: gross.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 93] /ptg/ - Private Trackers General
item.description:
>Not sure what private trackers are all about?
A private tracker is a torrent website that provides the same functionality as a public tracker but is invite-only. Each member share common goals: collecting, preserving and discussing media.

>Have a question?
- FAQ https://archive.is/UVQkn
- WIKI https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Private_trackers
- STUDY https://www.cambridge.org/core/services/aop-cambridge-core/content/view/2F379FE0CB50DF502F0075119FD3E060
- SPREADSHEET https://hdvinnie.github.io/Private-Trackers-Spreadsheet/
- TEN CURRY COMMANDMENTS https://pastebin.com/raw/dBbdE73M
- TEN NEON COMMANDMENTS https://pastebin.com/raw/Ud2pGYaE
- IRC irc://irc.sageru.org#ptg

Use >>>/g/ptg as a link to find the /ptg/ thread.

Remember the following:
>READ THE OP BEFORE MAKING A FUCKING QUESTION YOU RETARDED FAGGOT
>It doesn't matter if you use the same username in different trackers, the staff still share your IP with each other.
>Staff is not reading, being /marked/ is a meme, and even if it isn't, it is.
>Don't ask for invites, it's private for a reason.
>If starting out you should interview for RED, rank to TM, wait on account age and get invites from there. THAT'S IT THAT IS ALL YOU HAVE TO DO.

>【NEWS】
it's over

item.title: [112] Trump lies with another big fat lie
item.description:
Trump continues his regressive propaganda campaign with more lies about foreign government deals, using excuses paid for by billionaires
https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2025/05/trump-org-foreign-real-estate-deals-unconstitutional-business-ethics-conflict-interest/
Trump Promised No New Business Deals With Foreign Governments. He Lied.
His family’s real estate deals put the president in direct conflict with the Constitution.

released an “ethics agreement” detailing how he would handle his personal business interests while in the White House. It is remarkably weak and does not require Trump to divest any of his holdings. Unlike a similar agreement for his first term, it does not prohibit the Trump Organization from striking new deals abroad while Trump is president. Instead, it simply prohibits the Trump Organization from striking deals directly with foreign governments.

Trump’s second-term ethics agreement is such a permissive document that it is challenging to find a way to violate it. But three months into his presidency, Trump has found a way.

Last Thursday, the Trump Organization struck a deal to build a $5.5 billion Trump International Golf Club in Qatar. To develop the project, the Trump Organization is partnering with Dar Global, a Saudi Arabian company, and Qatari Diar, a company owned by the Qatari government. Qatari Diar was established by Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund in 2005. Its stated purpose is to “coordinate the country’s real estate development priorities.”

Original filename: Trump-Excuses-58b8dc005f9b58af5c8f8e91.jpg

item.title: [ 32] Order4me: hungry hippo edition
item.description:
Going to go gamble and on the way I’m stopping at the hungry hippo sun shop. I want you, the /ck/ crowd to decide what I eat. Here’s a menu. I’ll use a random number generator to figure out the winning order. I’ll post pics of the winning order and tell you what I thought of it. Will happen within 48 hours

item.title: [ 37] Trump:America can't compete against Chinesekinos
item.description:
The Chinaman is too powerful...

https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cjr7e2z1rxyo

Trump says non-US movies to be hit with 100% tariffs
54 minutes ago
Peter Hoskins
Business reporter
Maia Davies
BBC News

US President Donald Trump says he will hit movies made in foreign countries with 100% tariffs, as he ramps up trade disputes with nations around the world.

Trump said he was authorizing the US Department of Commerce and Trade Representative to start the process of imposing the levy because America's movie industry was dying "a very fast death."

He blamed a "concerted effort" by other countries that offer incentives to attract filmmakers and studios, which he described as a "National Security threat".

His remarks could spell a "knock-out blow" to the industry, one union warned, where filmmakers have for years left Hollywood for destinations like the UK and Canada in search of lower costs.

Trump said on his Truth Social platform: "It is, in addition to everything else, messaging and propaganda!"

"WE WANT MOVIES MADE IN AMERICA, AGAIN!"

US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick responded to the announcement, saying, "We're on it."

But the details of the move are unclear. Trump's statement did not say whether the tariff would apply to American production companies producing films abroad.

Several recent major movies produced by US studios were shot outside of America, including Deadpool & Wolverine, Wicked, and Gladiator II.

It was also unclear if the tariffs would apply to films on streaming services, like Netflix, as well as those shown at cinemas, or how they would be calculated.

The founder of European cinema chain Vue, Timothy Richards, questioned how Trump would define a US film.

Speaking to BBC Radio 4's Today program, he said: "Is it where the money comes from? The script, the director, the talent, where it was shot?"

Original filename: GqJEHteWkAAG6SR.jpg

item.title: [237] /tcg/ Trading Card Game General
item.description:
Lacrima Edition

>I want to learn the game, where do I begin?
Download PTCGL at https://tcg.pokemon.com/en-us/tcgl
The game has a quick tutorial and a bunch of decent decks to get you started against other beginners or against the AI. Some of those decks are very close to meta too. You can also go to your local game store and see if people are playing Pokémon.

>I know how to play, how do I make my own deck?
You have a decent beginner's guide at https://www.justinbasil.com/guide
There's also the old /tcg/ guide at https://imgur.com/a/W4NkOu6
After that, look up meta decks and try to reverse engineer them to see how things work.

>Where to find meta decks?
For big irl events, go to https://limitlesstcg.com/decks
For online events, go to https://play.limitlesstcg.com/decks?game=PTCG
For japanese events, go to https://pokecabook.com/archives/1417

Previous thread: >>57733495

Old /tcg/ pastebin: https://pastebin.com/Ge95YuMA

item.title: [209] /out/ings with a pipe
item.description:
Old thread: >>2774508

This is a thread for enjoying a pipe while doing outdoor activities. If you ask why this belongs on /out/, you've never spent an evening by the campfire with a pipe silently enjoying the nature around you, and you're missing out.

>how to get started
Purchase a Missouri Meerschaum Legend and a pouch of Half and Half or Captain Black tobacco, available at most smoke shops. You will need a lighter or match, and something to tamp it with--a large nail works well if you don't have a pipe tool. Fill the pipe with tobacco, pack it down halfway, top it off, pack it down to 3/4, top it off again, pack gently and enjoy. Smoke slower than you think you need to, the tobacco tastes best when it is burning cool. Tamp and re-light as needed. If you still have trouble, try different methods on YouTube until you find one that works for you.

>smoking a pipe will give you cancer
While any tobacco consumption comes with some risk, the cancer risks from occasional pipe use are pretty minimal. Educate yourself and make your own informed health decisions. Some info here https://aacrjournals.org/cancerpreventionresearch/article/10/12/704/46541/Association-between-Cigar-or-Pipe-Smoking-and

>muh weed
Not the time or place. Start your own thread

>I DON’T LIKE WHAT YOU LIKE REEEEEE
Then leave the thread. Pipes have been a part of outdoors culture for centuries. If you don’t like it, leave.

item.title: [286] QTDDTOT
item.description:
Questions That Don't Deserve Their Own Thread
>also known as /sqt/ (Stupid Questions Thread)

For your quick one-off questions that pertain to travel.

Long or convoluted questions should get their own thread.

Questions about popular destinations should be asked in any active thread about them.
